name: Chilie Peppers
description:
Story will first tell about the joint childhood, funny stories from the junior school. You are gradually transferred to the present time, where the main characters are already adults and show their vivid imaginations. Find out what the girls think and how they spend time together in their room.

Beth is a young main character who lives with her family in a private house. She has the best friend of Chilie. Chilie start to live with Beth family, after a series of sad events with the her family.Features
  • Visual Novel game with Sexy Content.
  • A cute and fun well written story-line.
  • 1080p window & Full Screen Options.
  • Steam achievements
